title: Both My Pixel and Pixel 3 won't auto suggest my yahoo email address, my Asus and Samsung phone will.
content: When I need to enter an email address for something both my Asus and Samsung phones will auto suggest my Yahoo email account; this is my primary email that i use and the yahoo app is installed on all phones. My Pixel line of phone will not auto suggest my yahoo email only my gmail address. Is there something i can do so it will or is google trying to block out their competitors??
